page.title: 05My Views on Plympton
page.content:
I think there should be more shops in Plympton. More clothes shops are needed so people do not have to go into Plymouth to buy clothes. I think we should have more leisure centres. We have a couple of parks and a youth club in Plympton but no swimming pool. There are a lot of bungalows in Plympton used by old people. There are also a lot of old peoples homes in Plympton. These include St Vincents, St Elizabeths, and the Castle Barbican. There are lots of schools in this area, but they are all very crowded. We should have more schools in Plympton, bigger schools and more teachers.
Sally Jones
